website_summaries.verdict: A super sleek front and hidden controls distinguish this model from others made by Sharp.
pros: Handles a good amount of power at 1000 watts
Retractable control panel lays flat on front until in use
Unit works well and has a flat front
Control panel faces up for ease of operation
cons: If you use your microwave for a kitchen clock, this model won't be your best choice, as the clock is hidden when the panel is closed

website_summaries.verdict: Choose this built-in microwave if you want the focus in your high-end kitchen to be on decor, as it has a streamlined, minimalist design.
pros: Features a unique drawer construction that has concealed controls that give it a seamless look
Shorter individuals will appreciate that it can be installed at a lower level than some other models in its class
cons: Some consumers may find switching to the drawer feature difficult to get use to after using standard microwaves

customer_reviews.title: So Awesome! I Love This Microwave!
customer_reviews.text: Best microwave ever!!! I love this microwave and I would recommend it to anyone who wants to save space and also if you have kids they always get a kick out of showing it to their friends when they come to the house! lol! It’s really strong/powerful and runs like a champ!!
customer_reviews.author: Jonathon Lang

customer_reviews.title: Show Stopper. Conversation Piece.
customer_reviews.text: Of all my appliances this was the most expensive but one of the coolest and definitely a conversation piece. Generally, the microwave in a nicely done kitchen is the eyesore. I didn't want one mounted about the stove because that reminds me of an apartment. Make sure you mount it correctly and just under the ledge of the counter top. It's very convenient to put stuff down into it rather than pull things out of the microwave especially with liquids.
customer_reviews.author: Susan D.

customer_reviews.title: Love this microwave.
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what we hoped for. Looks so great in the island of our newly remodeled kitchen. We are extremely happy with it. We also love the black stainless color.
customer_reviews.author: Golfergurl

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to clean.
customer_reviews.text: Great microwave until ya have to clean it. Have you ever cleaned a drawer in place with food all over it from children? Who am I kidding this just added to the drawers in the house I have to clean now, except this one gets exceptionally messy. My sisters kids absolutely love it though because its at a height they can operate the controls to make corndogs. If it were easier to clean I would give it 10/10 but because of the difficulty I’ve had cleaning it I’m gonna give it a 7.
customer_reviews.author: Michael William Ferrera

customer_reviews.title: Good until
customer_reviews.text: So for the unit is great and works very well love it in the kitchen everyone is amazed about the microwave drawer I have no pros or cons at this time I think it’s 100% awesome
customer_reviews.author: Joey

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t last
customer_reviews.text: Bought almost 3 years ago, and it looks great and was fun to have but no longer works and to expensive to fix.
customer_reviews.author: lind

customer_reviews.title: Great looking, works well, but had early failure
customer_reviews.text: I love the microwave - but the first one failed in less than three years. Fortunately had warranty. Took a while to get a check, but that’s the warranty company’s failure not Sharp. Sure hope the second one lasts longer.
customer_reviews.author: Soundside

customer_reviews.title: Much safer for vertically challenged people like myself.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this microwave. My old microwave was above the stove; placing it under countertop is more convenient and safer.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: The box was undamaged but it came with a large dent on the top panel, more than just cosmetic, could not open and close. Had to return.
customer_reviews.author: Josey

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking but basic functions hard to make work.
customer_reviews.text: This product looks great when mounted flush in the cabinet but simple functions like cook for 2 minutes or activate the "Blue Light" function are next to impossible to figure out. The company should offer some videos that should usage of the control panel. The control panel is impossible to read even with an overhead light turned on. The options should be light enough to find them without searching for a flash light. I would not recommend this product for anyone just wanting something that functions for simply kitchen usages.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Product damaged
customer_reviews.text: Product was damaged. There were several nicks in the exterior of the unit and one dented scratch on the front of the microwave. These nicks on the front of the microwave will be visible when the unit is installed, and I am worried that the black stainless steel will continue to chip away in the already damaged areas. There was also a large dent in the exterior metal shell, however this part of the unit will not be visible after it is installed in the cabinetry.
customer_reviews.author: bkc

customer_reviews.title: Works great for us
customer_reviews.text: Fit, function, quality, color, size, can warm everyone a bowl of soup at the same time!
